thread.title: Jolly LLB 2 Review by Arshad Warsi: Akshay Kumar has performed 10 times better than me
thread.title_full: Jolly LLB 2 Review by Arshad Warsi: Akshay Kumar has performed 10 times better than me

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Jolly LLB 2 Review by Arshad Warsi: Akshay Kumar has performed 10 times better than me
text:
Akshay Kumar was present at the special screening of his film 'Jolly LLB 2' held in Mumbai. The night was surely special for the actor as he was busy receiving praises for his performance in the film. 

Rajkumar Hirani confirms ‘Munna Bhai 3’ with Sanjay Dutt and Arshad Warsi Ace director Rajkumar Hirani is currently busy shooting for Sanjay Dutt's biopic starring Ranbir Kapoor in the lead. 
Actor Arshad Warsi , who played the lead in the 2013 courtroom drama 'Jolly LLB' was present for the screening along with his wife Maria Goretti . The Munnabhai actor went gaga over Akki's performance in the film and about the same, he said, " Akshay has performed 10 times better than me. I knew the story but it was really fun to watch the film. The whole thing about a bad lawyer becoming a good lawyer was interesting. The film takes you through all the trauma he faces while solving the case." 


Other celebs, who were seen at the screening were Athiya Shetty, Huma Qureshi and Sayani Gupta. 

'Jolly LLB 2' is written and directed by Subhash Kapoor . It also stars Saurabh Shukla and Annu Kapoor in pivotal roles. 

Also Read: Jolly LLB 3 Movie Review
